comments:
Description:
NPE when press delete in crosstab empty cell.[1102]

Build number:2.2.0.v20070326

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a cube.
2. Insert a cross tab.
3. Drag measures to cross tab detail area.
4. Select the measure in cross tab cell, press delete twice.

Expected result:
The first delete action will delete measure, the second will do nothing.

Actual result:
First delete remove measure, the second delete cause NPE.



Error log:
An unexpected internal exception occurred.Please see log for detail.
